description: The Contract is for Excavating Services at Correctional Service Canada institutions
full_summary:
Gatineau, QC - Solicitation Number: WS3760936113
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing a Solicitation for Excavating Contractor Services.
**Solicitation Overview**

* Description: This solicitation is for a Excavating Contractor Services Standing Offer to undertake general excavation work, including supply and installation of utility piping/conduits and associated accessories, at Correctional Service Canada (CSC) institutions.
* Performance period: The standing offer will be issued for a period of two (2) years with one (1) subsequent option year period.
* The CSC requires a contractor to provide services on an “as requested” basis for excavation and earthworks at CSC facilities in Alberta.

**Key Deliverables**

* General excavation work
* Supply and installation of utility piping/conduits and associated accessories
* The contract is for an as-when-required basis at CSC facilities in Alberta.

**Administrative Information**

* Solicitation Number: WS3760936113
* Publication Date: January 4, 2023
* Tender Closing Time: January 24, 2023, 2:00 p.m. MST
* Tender Closing Date: January 24, 2023

**Contact Information**

* Contact Name: Virakorn, Matthew (SPAC/PSPC)
* E-mail: [matthew.virakorn@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:matthew.virakorn@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Procurement Method**

* This solicitation is competitive, and open bidding will be used to select a contractor.

**Evaluation Criteria**

* The lowest price will be used to evaluate bids.

**Industry Classification**

* UNSPSC Code: 22101500 (Earth moving machinery)
* GSC Code: Not applicable

This solicitation will be published on Ariba Discovery, and interested contractors can access the solicitation documents and linkage to the Ariba Discovery portal.

**Important Notes**

* Corrigendum: On January 4, 2023, the PSPC published a Corrigendum to correct the closing time for the solicitation. Bidders are expected to disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by January 24, 2023, by 12:00 p.m. MST. This is to prevent bids being declared non-responsive.
